info.title: Schema of Azure Machine Learning Services events published to Azure Event Grid
info.description: Describes the schema of the Azure Machine Learning Services events published to Azure Event Grid. This corresponds to the Data property of an EventGridEvent.

MachineLearningServicesModelRegisteredEv.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for an Microsoft.MachineLearningServices.ModelRegistered event.

modelName.description: The name of the model that was registered.

modelVersion.description: The version of the model that was registered.

modelTags.description: The tags of the model that was registered.

modelProperties.description: The properties of the model that was registered.

MachineLearningServicesModelDeployedEven.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for an Microsoft.MachineLearningServices.ModelDeployed event.

serviceName.description: The name of the deployed service.

serviceComputeType.description: The compute type (e.g. ACI, AKS) of the deployed service.

modelIds.description: A common separated list of model IDs. The IDs of the models deployed in the service.

serviceTags.description: The tags of the deployed service.

serviceProperties.description: The properties of the deployed service.

MachineLearningServicesRunCompletedEvent.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for an Microsoft.MachineLearningServices.RunCompleted event.

experimentId.description: The ID of the experiment that the run belongs to.

experimentName.description: The name of the experiment that the run belongs to.

runId.description: The ID of the Run that was completed.

runType.description: The Run Type of the completed Run.

runTags.description: The tags of the completed Run.

runProperties.description: The properties of the completed Run.

MachineLearningServicesDatasetDriftDetec.description: Schema of the Data property of an EventGridEvent for an Microsoft.MachineLearningServices.DatasetDriftDetected event.

dataDriftId.description: The ID of the data drift monitor that triggered the event.

dataDriftName.description: The name of the data drift monitor that triggered the event.

runId.description: The ID of the Run that detected data drift.

baseDatasetId.description: The ID of the base Dataset used to detect drift.

targetDatasetId.description: The ID of the target Dataset used to detect drift.

driftCoefficient.description: The coefficient result that triggered the event.

startTime.description: The start time of the target dataset time series that resulted in drift detection.

endTime.description: The end time of the target dataset time series that resulted in drift detection.
